title: How to Make Vegan Apple Cake

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 400ºF/204ºC.
steps.description: Prepare the cake pan by lining with parchment paper (baking paper).

steps.headline: Peel the apples.
steps.description: Remove any pieces that are bruised or rotten.

steps.headline: Place the diced apples into a bowl.
steps.description: Pour water over the diced apples to cover. Add lemon juice to the bowl of diced apples in water. This will prevent their discoloration and prepares them for adding to the cake mixture.

steps.headline: Mix the dry ingredients in a large bowl.
Melt the vegan margarine if using.
steps.description: Otherwise, pour the oil into a medium bowl. Add the soy/rice/oat milk and the tablespoon of lemon juice.

steps.headline: Add the mashed banana to the oil mix.
Pour the oil mix into the dry mix and combine.
Drain the apples and add them.
Pour the cake mix into the prepared cake pan.
Arrange the apple pieces around the cake decoratively.
steps.description: Drizzle over some maple syrup if using. Add cinnamon.

steps.headline: Place in the oven and bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until a skewer inserted into the cake comes out clean.
Remove from the oven.
steps.description: Leave to cool on a wire cooling rack. Serve as is or with whipped tofu cream or apple jam.

text: Preheat the oven to 400ºF/204ºC. Prepare the cake pan by lining with parchment paper (baking paper). Peel the apples. Remove any pieces that are bruised or rotten. Dice the apples.  Place the diced apples into a bowl. Pour water over the diced apples to cover. Add lemon juice to the bowl of diced apples in water. This will prevent their discoloration and prepares them for adding to the cake mixture. Mix the dry ingredients in a large bowl.  Melt the vegan margarine if using. Otherwise, pour the oil into a medium bowl. Add the soy/rice/oat milk and the tablespoon of lemon juice. Mash the banana.  Add the mashed banana to the oil mix.  Pour the oil mix into the dry mix and combine. Don't over mix. Drain the apples and add them. Gently fold through. Pour the cake mix into the prepared cake pan.  Arrange the apple pieces around the cake decoratively. Drizzle over some maple syrup if using. Add cinnamon. Place in the oven and bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until a skewer inserted into the cake comes out clean.  Remove from the oven. Leave to cool on a wire cooling rack. Serve as is or with whipped tofu cream or apple jam.
